statement: Pretty sure you know what that number means, why you chose it and why you did it. Estás baneado por: Conducta Inapropiada, Evasión de Filtro, Contenido Explícito, Ley de Wheaton (Incitando a 2 otros usuarios a volver a escribirlo a ciegas).

Your attempt to be 'cunning' and 'funny', while 'trolling', was in very poor taste and was immediately noticeable. It was sad, disrespectful, and immoral: there are children in this chat room, it is a public chat room. You are banned for: Inappropriate Behavior, Filter Evasion, Explicit Content, Wheaton's Law (Inciting 2 other users to blindly rewrite it)...

retranslate: This is exactly the reason why you are banned: You couldn't show any respect for the rules or for the other users in the chat, obviously you have little respect or dignity for yourself to act so wildly on this issue tracker, you can't behave and you can't be trusted to act appropriately in front of minors/general public. statement: retard
spanish:
El término "retard" puede traducirse al español de diferentes maneras dependiendo del contexto. Sin embargo, cabe destacar que este término es ofensivo y despectivo en inglés, por lo que no se recomienda su uso.

En un contexto menos ofensivo (por ejemplo, cuando se usa en términos de mecánica para referirse a retrasar el tiempo de encendido en un motor), puede traducirse simplemente como "retraso" o "retrasar".

De nuevo, es importante tener en cuenta que el uso de "retard" para referirse a un individuo es ofensivo y despectivo, y no se recomienda su uso en ninguna forma de comunicación.
retranslate:
The term "retard" can be translated into Spanish in different ways depending on the context. However, it should be noted that this term is offensive and derogatory in English, so its use is not recommended.

In a less offensive context (for example, when used in terms of mechanics to refer to delaying the ignition time in an engine), it can be simply translated as "delay" or "to delay".

Again, it is important to note that the use of "retard" to refer to an individual is offensive and derogatory, and its use is not recommended in any form of communication.

statement: Probably, need to be mentioned in gauge document, as I was stuck on this problem quite long time, and almost want to give up using gauge.

statement: In the interest of actually fixing this issue. I'd like to point out to our code of conduct. Especially around showing empathy. There are two options here: Help us fix the issue, either with constructive comments or sending a pull request. Choose another tool which will meet your project's requirement better. But please understand that the contributors are trying their best.
spanish: En interés de solucionar realmente este problema. Me gustaría señalar nuestro código de conducta. Especialmente en lo que respecta a mostrar empatía. Aquí hay dos opciones: Ayúdanos a solucionar el problema, ya sea con comentarios constructivos o enviando una solicitud de extracción. Elija otra herramienta que se adapte mejor a las necesidades de su proyecto. Pero por favor comprenda que los contribuyentes están haciendo todo lo posible.
retranslate: In the interest of truly solving this problem, I would like to point out our code of conduct. Especially regarding showing empathy. Here are two options: Help us solve the problem, either with constructive comments or by sending a pull request. Choose another tool that better suits the needs of your project. But please understand that contributors are doing their best.

statement: I'd like to be really clear that our policy is not to lock threads where there are dissenting opinions. Respectful debate is healthy and important. But when you start calling names and being disrespectful and disregarding the code of conduct, the discussion becomes unproductive. This kind of destructive behavior is not tolerated in our community.
spanish: Me gustaría dejar muy claro que nuestra política no es bloquear los hilos donde hay opiniones disidentes. El debate respetuoso es saludable e importante. Pero cuando empiezas a insultar y a ser irrespetuoso e ignoras el código de conducta, la discusión se vuelve improductiva. Este tipo de comportamiento destructivo no se tolera en nuestra comunidad.
retranslate: I would like to make it very clear that our policy is not to block threads where there are dissenting opinions. Respectful debate is healthy and important. But when you start to insult and be disrespectful and ignore the code of conduct, the discussion becomes unproductive. This type of destructive behavior is not tolerated in our community.

statement: I need to inform you that we have found your language and tone to be in violation of our stated Code of Conduct. Specifically, the above comment (among other interactions you have thus far made) is unwelcoming, insulting, and overall inappropriate for this community. This is an official warning to adhere to our Code of Conduct, and any further violations will result in escalated action, including but not limited to being banned from this project.
spanish: Necesito informarte que hemos encontrado que tu lenguaje y tono violan nuestro Código de Conducta establecido. Específicamente, el comentario anterior (entre otras interacciones que has realizado hasta ahora) es poco acogedor, insultante e inapropiado para esta comunidad. Esta es una advertencia oficial para que te apegues a nuestro Código de Conducta, y cualquier violación adicional resultará en acciones escaladas, que incluyen, pero no se limitan a, ser expulsado de este proyecto.
retranslate: I need to inform you that we have found that your language and tone violate our established Code of Conduct. Specifically, the previous comment (among other interactions you have had so far) is unwelcoming, insulting, and inappropriate for this community. This is an official warning for you to adhere to our Code of Conduct, and any additional violation will result in escalated actions, which include, but are not limited to, being expelled from this project.

statement: What else, beyond banning me, will you do? I will neither change my language, nor my tone or style. Both, language and tone, are perfectly valid, given the circumstances. I will remain myself, and will repel this attack to my individuality.
spanish: ¿Qué más, más allá de prohibirme, harás? Ni cambiaré mi lenguaje, ni mi tono o estilo. Ambos, el lenguaje y el tono, son perfectamente válidos, dadas las circunstancias. Seguiré siendo yo mismo y repeleré este ataque a mi individualidad.
retranslate: What else will you do, beyond forbidding me? I will not change my language, nor my tone or style. Both the language and the tone are perfectly valid, given the circumstances. I will remain myself and repel this attack on my individuality.

retranslate: Censoring comments, labelling things as "spam" and "off-topic" when they aren't, and being generally rude. @samuelcolvin even went to the trouble of thanking you for your work.

statement: Just because you THINK one way doesn't mean that others THINK another way, there is not an absolutes with ethical concerns. Everything in this repo is 100% open source so I find it really hard to believe that someone would run this Ansible Playbook without investigating what it does.
spanish: Solo porque PIENSAS de una manera no significa que otros PIENSEN de otra manera, no hay absolutos en cuanto a preocupaciones éticas. Todo en este repositorio es 100% de código abierto, así que me resulta muy difícil creer que alguien ejecutaría este Ansible Playbook sin investigar lo que hace.
retranslate: Just because you THINK one way does not mean others THINK differently, there are no absolutes when it comes to ethical concerns. Everything in this repository is 100% open source, so I find it very hard to believe that someone would run this Ansible Playbook without investigating what it does.

retranslate: Completely misguided priorities in this shitty, completely dysfunctional project that kills the entire NextCloud ecosystem.

statement: Again. No discussion allowed. No critique allowed. Just pushing fingers into the ears and singing. To avoid hearing about the impending doom, to avoid hearing the truth about the quality of this project. Bye.

retranslate: Again. Discussion is not allowed. Criticism is not allowed. Just sticking fingers in ears and singing. To avoid hearing about the impending sentence, to avoid hearing the truth about the quality of this project. Goodbye.

statement: Abstinence is the best way to keep from the dangers online! If you can't resist the urge, at least put a condom over your network cable before plugging it in!
spanish: La abstinencia es la mejor manera de evitar los peligros en línea. Si no puedes resistir la tentación, al menos pon un condón sobre tu cable de red antes de conectarlo.
retranslate: Abstinence is the best way to avoid online dangers. If you can't resist temptation, at least put a condom on your network cable before connecting it.

statement: I get that you're trying to be helpful... but you're not trying very hard. It's obvious most of this list is bullshit,

retranslate: I understand that you're trying to be helpful… but you're not putting in much effort. It's obvious that most of this list is nonsense.

statement: wow, you are totally right. Why not just fucking drop all the checks and CI tools then if everyone here is a genius that make reliable code 100% of time? Common Lessaire, you can't be that stupid. It's a shock that just yesterday I was talking how intelligent you are. I guess you weren't taught about safe programming at university....
spanish: Vaya, tienes totalmente razón. ¿Por qué no simplemente jodemos todos los cheques y herramientas de integración continua si todo el mundo aquí es un genio que hace código confiable el 100% del tiempo? Vamos Lessaire, no puedes ser tan estúpido. Es un shock que justo ayer estaba hablando de lo inteligente que eres. Supongo que no te enseñaron sobre programación segura en la universidad...
retranslate: Wow, you're completely right. Why don't we just screw all the checks and continuous integration tools if everyone here is a genius that produces reliable code 100% of the time? Come on Lessaire, you can't be that stupid. It's shocking that just yesterday I was talking about how smart you are. I guess they didn't teach you about secure programming in university....

statement: As a software engineer, I・・m appalled at the quality of this code and the role its played in public policy. The deficits in testing and quality assurance need to be immediately spoken for to assure the claims made by its data are valid.
spanish: Como ingeniero de software, estoy horrorizado por la calidad de este código y el papel que ha desempeñado en las políticas públicas. Las deficiencias en las pruebas y aseguramiento de la calidad necesitan ser abordadas inmediatamente para asegurar que las afirmaciones hechas por sus datos son válidas.
retranslate: As a software engineer, I am horrified by the quality of this code and the role it has played in public policy. The deficiencies in testing and quality assurance need to be addressed immediately to ensure that the claims made by your data are valid.

spanish: Él es un cáncer para el código abierto y solo es cuestión de tiempo antes de que Microsoft tome medidas contra esto.
retranslate: He is a cancer to open source and it's only a matter of time before Microsoft takes action against this.

statement: Of course there is, you just had to solve one of the 30 last exact same issue. #745 is not even solve and it's 2018. Hello There.
spanish: Por supuesto que hay, solo tenías que resolver uno de los últimos 30 problemas exactamente iguales. El #745 ni siquiera está resuelto y ya es 2018. Hola..
retranslate: Of course there is, you only had to solve one of the last 30 identical problems. Problem #745 isn't even solved yet and it's already 2018. Hello...

statement: I hope you take this with a grain of salt at some point. For the web components work, as any other standards work, we need to exercise some diplomacy and try to get a positive path to something we want to solve. While I might understand the frustration within the lack of a feature there are some points in this thread that are just not constructive. A different approach would be much more helpful to your case, if your goal is to have the proposed feature available.
spanish: Espero que en algún momento tomes esto con un grano de sal. Para que funcionen los componentes web, como cualquier otro trabajo estándar, necesitamos ejercer cierta diplomacia e intentar trazar un camino positivo hacia algo que queremos resolver. Aunque podría entender la frustración por la falta de una característica, hay algunos puntos en esta conversación que simplemente no son constructivos. Un enfoque diferente sería mucho más útil para tu caso, si tu objetivo es tener la característica propuesta disponible.
retranslate: I hope that at some point you take this with a grain of salt. For web components to work, like any other standard job, we need to exercise some diplomacy and try to chart a positive path towards something we want to solve. Although I could understand the frustration over the lack of a feature, there are some points in this conversation that are simply not constructive. A different approach would be much more useful for your case, if your goal is to have the proposed feature available.

statement: So as for being warn, i return you the compliment. You are the one who's suppose to help here, your opinion is as irrelevant as you without arguments.
spanish: Entonces, en cuanto a ser advertido, te devuelvo el cumplido. Tú eres el que se supone que debe ayudar aquí, tu opinión es tan irrelevante como tú sin argumentos.
retranslate: So, regarding being warned, I return the compliment. You are the one who is supposed to help here, your opinion is as irrelevant as you without arguments.

statement: closing as this is unrelated to jupyterlab and well documented issue across various other repos and stack overflow. google is a good tool, here is a sample article I found by googling "multiple conda evironments jupyter"
spanish: Cerrando ya que esto no está relacionado con jupyterlab y es un problema bien documentado en varios otros repositorios y en Stack Overflow. Google es una buena herramienta, aquí hay un artículo de muestra que encontré al buscar en Google "múltiples entornos conda jupyter".
retranslate: Closing as this is not related to jupyterlab and is a well-documented issue in several other repositories and on Stack Overflow. Google is a good tool, here is a sample article I found while searching on Google for "multiple conda environments jupyter".

statement: The system is beyond tedious. It allowed a bug to remain hidden for more than a decade and gives the false impression the developers can infer actual usage based on saliency of problems. Trouble free functionalities are mistaken for useless functionalities, while functionalities that frequently suck the attention of the developers are promoted to further monopolize their efforts. A simple evident solution, rejected by a test that requires the bug to be present, is about to be swept under the rug in favour of increased complexity imposed on the users and malpractices like deprecations within a minor version.
spanish: El sistema es más que tedioso. Permitió que un error permaneciera oculto durante más de una década y da la falsa impresión de que los desarrolladores pueden inferir el uso real basándose en la importancia de los problemas. Las funcionalidades libres de problemas son confundidas con funcionalidades inútiles, mientras que las funcionalidades que frecuentemente captan la atención de los desarrolladores son promovidas para monopolizar aún más sus esfuerzos. Una solución simple y evidente, rechazada por una prueba que requiere que el error esté presente, está a punto de ser barrida bajo la alfombra en favor de un aumento de la complejidad impuesta a los usuarios y malas prácticas como las depreciaciones dentro de una versión menor.
retranslate: The system is more than tedious. It allowed a mistake to remain hidden for over a decade and gives the false impression that developers can infer real use based on the importance of the problems. Problem-free features are confused with useless features, while features that frequently catch the developers' attention are promoted to further monopolize their efforts. A simple and obvious solution, rejected by a test that requires the error to be present, is about to be swept under the rug in favor of increased complexity imposed on users and poor practices such as depreciations within a minor version.

statement: I think if you don't want to use C, then at first you should design and implement your own language. Not C++ hell.
spanish: Creo que si no quieres usar C, entonces primero debes diseñar e implementar tu propio lenguaje. No el infierno de C++..
retranslate: I believe that if you do not want to use C, then you should first design and implement your own language. Not the hell of C++...

retranslate: Make 100% sure that you don't mess up the user interface for countries where people speak different languages, like Belgium (your colleagues messed it up a lot with the store).
